HomePage.hero.title: Carry Forward the Classics, Rejuvenate TCM with Technology
HomePage.hero.desc: HeyTCM Intelligent TCM Co-creation Circle: Use AI and open data to interpret body signals, quantify Qi & Blood, and start your personalized health renaissance journey.
HomePage.painPointsTitle: Feel Something's Off, But Can't Explain or Detect It?

HomePage.painPoints.text: Tossing and turning, tired after sleep? (I suffered from insomnia for 20+ years)
Recurring skin issues, acne, rashes? (I battled acne for 10 years, urticaria for 4 years)

HomePage.painPointsBottom: HeyTCM is translating the language of your body with data...
HomePage.solutions.title: See 'Qi & Blood' with Data, Manage Health Intelligently
HomePage.solutions.desc: The perfect combination of TCM wisdom and modern technology, providing you with professional and personalized health management solutions.

HomePage.cta.title: Join HeyTCM and Co-create the New Era of Intelligent TCM!
HomePage.cta.desc: Your participation—using products, sharing data, or supporting us—is a key force in the revival of TCM.
HomePage.founder.title: I am Sheng Haiwang. After 30 years of physical and mental tempering and 15 years of medical technology exploration, I firmly believe TCM wisdom deserves to be seen and quantified. HeyTCM is a light I ignite for myself and for everyone who desires physical and mental ease.
